topic: Quiz Security & Academic Integrity: Design for Trust, Not Just Lockdown
target_audience: program leads, instructors, and platform admins

refs.content: Shift from detection to design; incorporate process evidence, authentic tasks, and clear AI‑use policies.
Regulatory guidance: diversify assessment modes, randomize items/parameters, assess higher‑order outcomes.
Practical strategies: large item banks, randomized variants, time windows, collaboration policies, and reflection prompts.

special_instructions: Provide security patterns (randomization, parameterization, large banks, IP/time windows) and open‑book designs with solution rationales.
